name: Quest For the Orange Juice
description:
This is my first game made in Unity. I was inspired by the youtuber Dani to get into unity, and for the theme of this game. Not very good. Also don't press escape. Also Also I think the ending is broke. Also Also Also if you just refresh it should fix everything.

In total I spent 2 months working on it, and abandoned it some time ago. Saw it in my projects and decided to do something with it, so here it is.
